results.title: Effects of Metformin on Experimental Varicocele in Rats.
results.text_hl: According to the results, a dose-dependent difference was observed in @<m>DISEASE_Testicular_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013736 @@@testis damage@@@ grade in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ treated groups, compared to that reported for the @DISEASE_Varicocele @DISEASE_MESH:D014646 @@@varicocele@@@ group (p &lt;0.05).

citations.NLM: Karimi H, Asghari A, Jahandideh A, Akbari G, Mortazavi P. Effects of Metformin on Experimental Varicocele in Rats. Arch Razi Inst. 2021 Jul;76(2):371-384. PMID: 34223735
citations.BibTeX: @article{34223735, title={Effects of Metformin on Experimental Varicocele in Rats.}, author={Karimi H and Asghari A and Jahandideh A and Akbari G and Mortazavi P}, journal={Arch Razi Inst}, volume={76}, number={2}, pages={371-384}}

results.title: The protective effect of metformin against testicular damage in diabetes and prostate cancer model.
results.text_hl: This suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should be further investigated as a targeted protective drug against @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Testicular_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013736 @@@damage to the testes@@@.

citations.NLM: Koroglu Aydın P, Karabulut-Bulan O, Bugan I, Turkyilmaz IB, Altun S, Yanardag R. The protective effect of metformin against testicular damage in diabetes and prostate cancer model. Cell Biochem Funct. 2022 Jan;40(1):60-70. PMID: 34845738
citations.BibTeX: @article{34845738, title={The protective effect of metformin against testicular damage in diabetes and prostate cancer model.}, author={Koroglu Aydın P and Karabulut-Bulan O and Bugan I and Turkyilmaz IB and Altun S and Yanardag R}, journal={Cell Biochem Funct}, volume={40}, number={1}, pages={60-70}}
